title: Building BESS Coding Agent: From DeepLearning.ai Course to Real-World Energy Trading
excerpt: Just wrapped up the DeepLearning.ai 'Building & Evaluating AI Agents' course and applied those learnings to create an intelligent coding agent for battery energy storage trading. Here's my journey from theory to practice.
content: Full blog post content about the BESS Coding Agent project...
author: Navisha Shetty
